snippet.title: Forgotten but Unbroken - Short Teaser
snippet.description:
Hello, everybody. We're bringing a big update to the game build, and with that being said  here's a short teaser for you :) 

Our social networks and store:

#xcom #ww2 #forgottenbutunbroken #turnbased #strategy
